content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: The apartment is located in the city center of Duisburg, close to the main train station.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] What was your initial offer for the monthly rent?

[Question] How much did you increase your offer each time?
name: Emilia Müller

content: My initial offer for the monthly rent was €850. I increased my offer by €50 each time.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What was the final price you agreed upon? Answer with "Yes" or "No" followed by the reason.
name: Emilia Müller

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. We could not come to an agreement, and the negotiation ended without a decision.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What was the highest price you were willing to pay?
name: Emilia Müller

content: The highest price I was willing to pay was €950 per month.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] How many times did you increase your offer in the conversation?
name: Emilia Müller
